title: (x) Lula magazine headlines and nameplate - Kursivschrift {Yves}
content:
Hello,

I can across this face in Lula magazine - headlines and masthead. Any Ideas on what it is? It looks familiar but I can't seem to find it any where.

thanks,

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [CIMG1586.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323040936/http:/typophile.com/files/CIMG1586.jpg) | 168.69 KB |
| [CIMG1590.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323040936/http:/typophile.com/files/CIMG1590.jpg) | 171.79 KB |
author: RobS

comments.content: The lovely [Kursivschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323040936/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=LH.101096.0.0), which is turning into a genuine Typophile Type ID Board Classicâ„¢.
It's on fire, indeed. Also used in _[Blueprint](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323040936/http:/flickr.com/photos/stewf/162759367/)_.
Thank you very much - it was driving me crazy, I knew I had seen it somewhere but couldn't put a name to it.
